meanings.definition: To surpass in intelligence or cleverness.
meanings.sent1: She outsmarts her classmates in math.
meanings.sent2: He always outsmarts his opponents in chess.
meanings.sent3: The clever fox outsmarts the tricky rabbit in the forest.
meanings.sent4: Her quick thinking outsmarts any challenge that comes her way.
meanings.sent5: Outsmarting others requires both wit and strategy.

meanings.definition: To outwit or outdo in a clever manner.
meanings.sent1: The detective outsmarts the criminals in solving the case.
meanings.sent2: She outsmarts her competitors in the business world.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat outsmarts the dog in a playful game.
meanings.sent4: His creativity outsmarts any obstacle he faces.
meanings.sent5: Outsmarting the competition is key to success in this industry.
